tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

full_summary:
# TSPS 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant
## Solicitation Number: 5000070983
### Published: 2023-03-21
### Closing: 2023-04-05T00:00:00
#### Status: [Expired]
## Request for Proposal for Evaluation Services Consultant
Environment and Climate Change Canada’s Evaluation Division is seeking consulting services to conduct the evaluation of the Federal Contaminated Sites Action Plan, to be completed by March 31, 2024. 

The services will be provided under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply. The proposed period of contract shall be from the contract award to March 31, 2024.

## Evaluation Requirements
### Secret Resource Minimum Security Level Required
### Company Minimum Security Level Required: Secret

## Scope of Work
The consultant will provide consulting services to conduct an evaluation of the Federal Contaminated Sites Action Plan. The evaluation should be completed by March 31, 2024.

## Eligibility Criteria
This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for category 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant.

## Trade Agreements
This requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Requirements for Registration
For more information about the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply and how to become a 'Qualified SA Holder', please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.

## Contact Information
For this requirement, contact Marie-Christine Blais at marie-christine.blais@ec.gc.ca.
## Property and Work Location
National Capital Region (NCR) in Canada.
## Security Classification
Secret
## Estimated contract duration: Until March 31, 2024.
